attributes.action: Pay £300 maximum for a house on benefits & £300 for workers to earn free of tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After watching Jobless on BBC TV it was 
a shock to see a family that did not work receive £580 without work this is stupid.£300 is ample for the unemployed.Workers earning £200 can still have stopped £42 in there wage packet leaving only £152 this is unfair.
In order to Finance this the Liberal
Mansion Tax be introduced plus the savings on the benefits. this will help bring people back into the work ethic which has been lose for some time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
